analysis.key_quote: The proposal to strip civil service protections and reclassify federal employees (by the President for any position at-will) to Schedule F shows Donald Trump and Elon Musk's continued flagrant disregard for common sense, and attacks on our PUBLIC HEALTH and NATIONAL SECURITY for their own profits/gains but at the cost of human lives.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes Schedule F, highlighting concerns about the loss of civil service protections, due process rights, and the potential for increased politicization of the federal workforce.
